amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 118-466 to increase and decrease FMF to express support for the Philippines.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Issa amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A001) and the bill pursuant to the rule.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Issa amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
